titles.title: Visa Waiver for Israel Act of 2013
A bill to provide for the inclusion of Israel in the visa waiver program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 2/7/2013--Introduced. Visa Waiver for Israel Act of 2013 - Includes Israel in the visa waiver program upon the Secretary of Homeland Security's (DHS) determination that Israel: (1) has complied with all the visa waiver program requirements, with an exception for the low nonimmigrant visa refusal rate; and (2) has made every reasonable effort, without jeopardizing Israeli security, to ensure that reciprocal privileges are extended to all U.S. citizens.
